inclusion.criterion: Clinically established coronary artery disease or carotid artery disease with greater than 15% stenosis by ultrasound
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Uses pacemaker or has metallic implants
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of alcohol or drug abuse
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient's LDL-C level is high, but he has no other cardiovascular risk factors. He also has a family history of CAD.
